title: ChefBonBon
description: Full-stack AI recipe platform using React, Node.js/Express, and Claude. Migrated from Firebase/Firestore to Supabase/Postgres with a fresh relational schema, secure auth, and real-time social features.

title: SynceUp
description: Collaboration and mentorship platform for interns and alumni. Leading frontend architecture, responsive layouts, and analytics experiences that keep participants engaged while we iterate toward launch.

title: Analytics Dashboard
description: Multi-hub analytics platform that converts customer signals into leader-ready summaries. Includes role-based access, deep filtering, AI-generated insights, and data transformation utilities for reliable KPIs.
